programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: Police say a mother implicated her son in a murder.

programme.title: Someone They Knew with Tamron Hall
programme.desc: The people of Defiance, Iowa, find it strange when Scott Shanahan disappears, leaving his wife and kids, but Scott is always unpredictable and no one gives it much more thought.

programme.title: Someone They Knew with Tamron Hall
programme.desc: Austin, Texas, TV executive Steven Beard is shot as he sleeps; with only a single shotgun shell to go on, police follow a trail from mansions and country clubs to bookstores and hospital psych wards.

programme.title: Someone They Knew with Tamron Hall
programme.desc: Penny Scaggs believes in being a dutiful Christian wife and even teaches local women how to build harmonious relationships; she is later found brutally beaten and stabbed beside her beloved yellow piano.

programme.title: Someone They Knew with Tamron Hall
programme.desc: S01/E119 When Susan Wright's husband, Jeffrey, was found buried in the backyard, stabbed 193 times, people dubbed her the blue-eyed butcher of the suburbs.

programme.title: Someone They Knew with Tamron Hall
programme.desc: Lita McClinton thinks the man at her door is just delivering a dozen pink roses, but the delivery guy delivers death instead; the decades-long hunt for justice spans multiple continents before reaching a dramatic conclusion in an Atlanta courtroom.

programme.title: Someone They Knew with Tamron Hall
programme.desc: When drug-addicted casino owner Ted Binion turns up dead in his mansion, the suspects are pure Vegas: an ex-stripper girlfriend, a contractor who knew where his silver was buried, and a mob boss who launders money through his casino.

programme.title: VPI: Vinnie Politan Investigates
programme.desc: Vinnie Politan takes a deep dive into the true crime stories that are captivating the world over.

programme.title: Opening Statements With Julie Grant
programme.desc: Former prosecutor Julie Grant is joined by a team of top trial attorneys and forensic experts to cover the high-stakes trials that are on the docket, and the crime cases dominating the headlines.

programme.desc: Gavel-to-gavel coverage and legal analysis of the nation's most compelling trials.
